name: Is the substrate suitable for application
All concrete grout or mortar spills have been removed
All protruding tie wire, nails and or bolt removed from surface
All bony and defective concrete finishes have been repaired with approved repair materials
Moisture content in the concrete lower than 4.5% are required by Manufacturer using Tramex CME moisture meter
Is the area barricaded and signed to prevent workers transiting across our prepared surfaces
Have all sources of dust/debris like power saws cutting timber etc been controlled prior to our application
Cracks in concrete over 3mm have been ground out and sealed with polyurethane sealant
Install 10mm radius Polyurethane coves been installed to all intersections
Install a minimum of 100mm turnup above finished floor level as per Manufacturers requirements
Install Tremco Vulkem 171 primer @7-10L/m2 and allow to cure 30-60 minutes or until tacky
Install Tremco Vulkem 350 base coat to manufacturers requirements @.81-1.08m2/L and allow to cure for 12 hours
Install Tremco Vulkem 951 top coat(if required) to manufacturers requirements @ 3.23m2/L and allow to cure for 24 hours
Check for each of the below and detail as per Tremco Standard details. Attach photos/comments where applicable
Flood test areas for a minimum of 24hrs
Has membrane been installed in accordance with AS4654.1&4654.2 (waterproof membranes for external above ground use)
Waterproofing works completed - Area left clean & tidy
FINAL - Pass when happy to proceed with work(s) (Any issues please comment below)
